entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to rain showers overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
